net.caspervg.lex4j.route

Class LotRoute

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.caspervg.lex4j.route.LotRoute

  • public class LotRoute
extends java.lang.Object
    Routing for the Lot Endpoint. Attention: methods can throw ResourceExceptions.
    See Also:
    Restlet Status API Javadoc, LEX API Overview on Github
